name: Amazoness Hot Spring
text:
When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Amazoness" monster to your hand, or place 1 "Amazoness" Pendulum Monster in your Pendulum Zone, from your Deck.
When you take battle damage while you control an "Amazoness" Monster Card: You can gain LP equal to the damage you took.
You can only use this effect of "Amazoness Hot Spring" once per turn.
